summary: CAR CONSUMES TOO MUCH OIL.  OIL CONSUMPTION TEST IN PROGRESS FROM MANUFACTURER.  3RD TIME WITH TEST.  I'VE TAKEN MY CAR TO THE MANUFACTURER 3 TIMES AND THEY TELL ME THAT THEY NEED TO DO THE TEST 3 TIMES IN ORDER TO GUARANTEE THERE'S SOMETHING WRONG.  THE CAR JUST EATS UP OIL LIKE CRAZY AND IT ONLY HAS 39K MILES.   *NLM
